alert.note: Alert for Delaware; Dubuque (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 03 at 6:10PM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Dubuque and northeastern Delaware Counties through 645 PM CDT... At 609 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Holy Cross, or 11 miles south of Guttenberg, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Colesburg, Holy Cross, Luxemburg, Rickardsville, Sherrill, Balltown, Bankston, Durango, Graf, Bankston Park, Mud Lake Park, Cottage Hill, Finley`s Landing Park, Waupeton, Lattnerville, Five Points, East Rickardsville and Camp Little Cloud. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
